article_title: With a paintbrush in one hand and a glass of wine in the other, Paintbar heads to Willy Street

article_metadata.description: The owners of Arte Wine and Painting Studios in Wauwatosa and Delafield plan to bring their studio art/bar combo to Willy Street in November.
article_metadata.author: Lindsay Christians | The Capital Times
